pkgmetadata.longdescription: Genomic Simulation of Purebred and Crossbred Populations // Simulation of purebred and crossbred genomic data as well as pedigree and phenotypes are possible by this package. 'xbreed' can be used for the simulation of populations with flexible genome structures and trait genetic architectures. It can also be used to evaluate breeding schemes and generate genetic data to test statistical tools.
